revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #46 Tanga |image = [[File:Tanga.png]] |caption = The flower grows at the tip of this Berry. It attracts Bug Pokémon by letting its stringy petals stream out. The attracted Bug Pokémon decreases the amount of harvestable Berries in nearby plants |growtime = 1h 0m 0s |harvest = 3 berries |replant = 50% |mutation = 0.01% |points = 500 |flavor =
*20 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Tanga''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with 8 [[Rindo]] berries. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 7 mins 30 secs || 15 mins || 30 mins || 1 hour - 2 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TangaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TangaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TangaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (harvest amount) | ||
x0.9 ||
x0.8 ||
x0.7 |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 hour -
2 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 40 mins -
1 hour 20 mins || 8 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 26 mins 40 secs -
53 mins 20 secs || 6 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Tanga_Flow_ChartV2.png|250px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Tanga berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Rindo.png|30px]]
